actions.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment increases funding for charter schools by $25 million and reduces the technology literacy challenge grant program accordingly.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 22 in the Congressional Record of July 29, 1997, to increase funding for charter schools by $25 million and to decrease funding for the Technology Literacy Challenge Fund commensurately.
